name: Tourist Scheduling Coordinator
description: Central scheduling coordinator that matches tourists with tour guides. Built with Google ADK and Azure OpenAI via LiteLLM. Receives tourist requests and guide offers, runs a greedy matching algorithm considering preferences, budgets, and availability.

skills.name: Register Tourist Request
skills.description: Registers a tourist's tour request with their availability windows, budget constraints, and category preferences (culture, food, history, adventure, etc.).
examples: Register tourist alice with availability from 2025-06-01T09:00:00 to 2025-06-01T17:00:00, preferences for culture and history, budget $80/hour
Add tourist bob interested in food and wine tours, available tomorrow morning, max budget $120/hour

skills.name: Register Guide Offer
skills.description: Registers a tour guide's availability, hourly rate, specialization categories, and maximum group size.
examples: Register guide marco specializing in culture and history, available 2025-06-01T08:00:00 to 2025-06-01T16:00:00, rate $50/hour, max 4 tourists
Add guide florence offering food and wine tours at $75/hour, available afternoons

skills.name: Run Scheduling Algorithm
skills.description: Executes the greedy matching algorithm to pair tourists with compatible guides based on preference overlap, budget constraints, time availability, and guide capacity.
examples: Run the scheduling algorithm to match tourists with guides
Execute matching for all pending requests

skills.name: Get Schedule Status
skills.description: Returns current system state including registered tourists, guides, completed assignments, and scheduling statistics.
examples: Show me all assignments and pending requests
